overview: Nari joined the company as a new employee. He shakes the hearts of men in all companies with his outstanding skills and looks. But she had a plan for her! Pretending to be in love with her boss's son, she registers her marriage with him, and makes another male mate, who doesn't know about it, to pay the price for her reckless treatment of her mother-in-law. A story like love and war in which Hye-sun, who was in a relationship with the president, has a well-thought-out plan, and eventually she takes a stake in all the companies!
title: Yoon Yul's Infidelity
